trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage> event contains an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> collection with warnings sent from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage>事件包含<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection>具有从数据源发出的警告的集合。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取从数据源发出的警告的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of warnings sent from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源发出的警告的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full text of the error sent from the database.
trans-unit.target: 获取从数据库发送错误的完整文本。

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError.Message%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> in the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 这是包装器<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError.Message%2A>属性的第一个<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError>中<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A>集合。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full text of the error.
Retrieves a string representation of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 检索的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.InfoMessage"></xref>事件。
